scripts.db:migrate: node scripts/migrate-to-d1.mjs > migration.sql && wrangler d1 execute sintlucasmasters --local --file=./migration.sql
scripts.db:reset: rm -rf .wrangler/state/v3/d1 && npm run db:init && npm run db:migrate
scripts.db:migrate:remote: node scripts/migrate-to-d1.mjs > migration.sql && wrangler d1 execute sintlucasmasters --remote --file=./migration.sql
scripts.db:reset:remote: npm run db:init:remote && npm run db:migrate:remote
